code:
import * as e from "react";
export default typeof window != "undefined" && typeof window.document != "undefined" && typeof window.document.createElement != "undefined" ? e.useLayoutEffect : e.useEffect;

sourcesContent: import*as e from"react";export default typeof window!="undefined"&&typeof window.document!="undefined"&&typeof window.document.createElement!="undefined"?e.useLayoutEffect:e.useEffect;
